play: Plays a song with the given url or name
playnow: Plays a song with the given url or name NOW, and afterwards goes on with the queue
playskip: Plays a song with the given url or name NOW, and skips all other songs in the queue
stop: Stops the songs, that's currently playing
pause: Pauses the song, that is currently playing
resume: Resumes the song, that is currently playing
volume: Changes the volume of the player
help: Shows a link to this page
disconnect: Disconnects the bot from the channel, without emptying the queue
loop: Loops/Unloops the song, that is currently playing
remove: Removes a song from the queue by its id
move: Moves a song to the first position by its id
skipto: Skips to a certain song by its id
charts: Adds the top 10 songs from the yt music charts for the given country code (default: AT)
default add/remove/clear: Adds/Removes/Clears <a song from>   your default Playlist
np: Shows the song, that is currently playing
replay: Play the song, that is currently playing, again
cleanup: Removes absent user's songs from the queue
shuffle: Shuffles the queue and skips the current playing song
search: Searches for a query on YouTube
join: Summons the bot to your channel
